Auckland bus attack: Driver told he was a servant, abused and punched on Avondale route in racially charged attack, suspect at large https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-bus-attack-driver-told-he-was-a-servant-abused-and-punched-on-avondale-route-in-racially-charged-攻击嫌疑人在逃/HMKLUUXY5JEW3C2MBQXVQJQUFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-bus-attack-driver-told-he-was-a-servant-abused-and-punched-on-avondale-route-in-racially-charged-攻击嫌疑人在逃/HMKLUUXY5JEW3C2MBQXVQJQUFY/ George BlockA passenger told the driver it was his country, later unleashing a vicious assault. Sat, 07 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Auckland bus driver Rajnish "Raj" Trehan suffered facial injuries after he was attacked by a passenger following racial abuse about 10am on the morning of Saturday, September 7, on the Number 18 bus in Avondale near Great North Rd.
